sqlMap.select:
select count(1) totcnt from ismcum030 a where 1 = 1
a.shopmallname LIKE '%' #search_key1# '%'
#search_filename# like concat('%',a.uploadtype,'%') and a.uploadgubun = 'M' and a.uploadtype != ''
select count(1) totcnt from ismodm010 where uploadfilename = #search_filename#

select a.cum030id, a.cum010id, b.coname, a.shopmallname, a.shopurl, a.shopuid, a.shoppwd, a.uploadtype, a.uploadgubun, (select count(distinct uploaddate) from ismodl010 where uploaddate >= SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR) and cum030id = a.cum030id) as uploadCnt, (select max(uploaddate) from ismodl010 where cum030id = a.cum030id) as lastUploadDate , b.account2 from ismcum030 a, ismcum010 b where a.cum010id = b.cum010id and a.useyn = 'Y' and b.useyn = 'Y'
a.shopmallname LIKE '%' #search_key1# '%'
#search_filename# like concat('%',a.uploadtype,'%') and a.uploadgubun = 'M' and a.uploadtype != ''
order by $orderbyclause$ limit #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
select a.cum030id, a.additem, a.isassign, a.orderfield, a.additemopt1, a.additemopt2 from ismodo010 a where a.cum030id = #cum030id#
select a.cum030id, a.apiurl, a.apicontext, a.apiversion from ismodo020 a where a.cum030id = #cum030id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ismodo020 (cum030id, apiurl, apicontext, apiversion) values (#cum030id#, #apiurl#, #apicontext#, #apiversion#)
sqlMap.update: update ismodo020 set apiurl = #apiurl#, apicontext = #apicontext#, apiversion = #apiversion# where cum030id = #cum030id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into ismodm010 ( orderno, orderdate, cum010id, cum030id, byc010id, orderuser, orderusercontact, rcvuser, rcvusercontact, orderitemid, orderitemopt, orderitemqty, orderitembyprice, postno, address, dlvmemo, dlvbyprice, dlvno, dlvco, dlvstatus, processdate, accountcum, accountbuy, status, cstype, uploadfilename, uploadviewkey, claimstatus, claimreason, retstatus, retqty, retprice, orderitemname, orderitemprice, dlvprice, rcvusercontacthp, rcvuseremail, regdate, orderitemcode ) values ( #orderno#, ifnull(#orderdate#, curdate()), #cum010id#, #cum030id#, #byc010id#, #orderuser#, #orderusercontact#, #rcvuser#, #rcvusercontact#, #orderitemid#, #orderitemopt#, #orderitemqty#, #orderitembyprice#, #postno#, #address#, #dlvmemo#, #dlvbyprice#, #dlvno#, #dlvco#, #dlvstatus#, #processdate#, #accountcum#, #accountbuy#, #status#, #cstype#, #uploadfilename#, #uploadviewkey#,#claimstatus#, #claimreason#, #retstatus#, #retqty#, #retprice#, IFNULL(IF(#orderitemname# = '', (select a.itemname from ismprd010 a where a.itemcode = #orderitemid#), #orderitemname#),''), IFNULL(IF(#orderitemprice# = '', (select a.itemprice from ismprd010 a where a.itemcode = #orderitemid#), #orderitemprice#),''), IFNULL(IF(#dlvprice# = '', (select a.itemdlvprice from ismprd010 a where a.itemcode = #orderitemid#), #dlvprice#),''), #rcvusercontacthp#, #rcvuseremail#, now(), IFNULL((select orderitemid from ismcum040 where cumprodcode = #orderitemid# and cumprodoptnm1 = #orderitemopt#),'') )

insert into ismodl010 (cum010id, cum030id, uploaddate, uploadviewkey) values
(#[].cum010id#, #[].cum030id#, #[].uploaddate#, #[].uploadviewkey#)
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from ismodm010 a left outer join ismcum040 bb on a.cum030id = bb.cum030id and a.orderitemid = bb.cumprodcode and a.orderitemopt = bb.cumprodoptnm1 left outer join ismprd010 d on bb.orderitemid = d.itemcode where uploadviewkey = #orderTempKey# and d.orderitemid is null;

select count(1) totcnt from ismodm010 a left outer join ismcum040 bb on a.cum030id = bb.cum030id and a.orderitemid = bb.cumprodcode and a.orderitemopt = bb.cumprodoptnm1 left outer join ismprd010 d on bb.orderitemid = d.itemcode left outer join ismbyc010 e on d.byc010id = e.byc010id left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE f on a.status = f.CODE and f.CODE_ID = 'ISM050'
left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE j on a.claimstatus = j.CODE and j.CODE_ID = 'ISM060' left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE k on a.claimreason = k.CODE and k.CODE_ID = 'ISM070' left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE l on a.retstatus = l.CODE and l.CODE_ID = 'ISM080' left outer join (SELECT orderno, orderdate, cum010id, cum030id, byc010id, orderuser, orderusercontact, rcvuser, rcvusercontact, orderitemid, orderitemopt, orderitemqty, orderitembyprice, orderitemprice, postno, address, orderitemname , COUNT(1) chkcnt, sum(case when status = '' then 0 else 1 end ) chksum FROM ismodm010 GROUP BY orderno, orderdate, cum010id, cum030id, byc010id, orderuser, orderusercontact, rcvuser, rcvusercontact, orderitemid, orderitemopt, orderitemqty, orderitembyprice, orderitemprice, postno, address, orderitemname HAVING COUNT(1) > 1 ) x on a.orderno = x.orderno and a.orderdate = x.orderdate and a.cum010id = x.cum010id and a.cum030id = x.cum030id and a.byc010id = x.byc010id and a.orderuser = x.orderuser and a.orderusercontact = x.orderusercontact and a.rcvuser = x.rcvuser and a.rcvusercontact = x.rcvusercontact and a.orderitemid = x.orderitemid and a.orderitemopt = x.orderitemopt and a.orderitemqty = x.orderitemqty and a.orderitembyprice = x.orderitembyprice and a.orderitemprice = x.orderitemprice and a.postno = x.postno and a.address = x.address and a.orderitemname = x.orderitemname,
ismcum010 b left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE h on b.cotype2 = h.CODE and h.CODE_ID in ('ISM031','ISM032') left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE i on b.cotype3 = i.CODE and i.CODE_ID in ('ISM041','ISM042','ISM043','ISM044'), LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE c, ismcum030 g where a.cum010id = b.cum010id and a.cum030id = g.cum030id and b.cotype1 = c.CODE and c.CODE_ID = 'ISM020'
a.uploadviewkey LIKE '%' #search_key1# '%'
a.odm010id = #odm010id#
a.status != ''
a.status = ''
a.uploadviewkey = #search_uploadviewkey# and a.cum010id = #search_cum010id# and a.cum030id = #search_cum030id#
a.uploadfilename = #search_uploadfilename#
d.orderitemid is not null and IFNULL(x.chkcnt, 0) = 0
d.orderitemid is null
x.chkcnt is not null
a.status = #search_status#
a.cstype = #search_cstype#
DATE_FORMAT(IF(a.orderdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)),'%Y-%m-%d') >= #dtSearch_frOrderDt#
DATE_FORMAT(IF(a.orderdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)),'%Y-%m-%d') <= #dtSearch_toOrderDt#
b.cotype1 = #dtSearch_cumType1#
e.bycname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_bycNm# '%'
b.coname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_cumNm# '%'
a.dlvno LIKE '%' #dtSearch_dlvNo# '%'
a.dlvco LIKE '%' #dtSearch_dlvCo# '%'
a.orderno LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderno# '%'
a.orderitemid LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemid# '%'
a.orderitemname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemName# '%'
a.rcvuser LIKE '%' #dtSearch_rcvUser# '%'
a.rcvusercontact LIKE '%' #dtSearch_rcvuserContact# '%'
a.orderuser LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderUser# '%'
concat(IFNULL(c.code_nm,''),IFNULL(e.bycname,''),b.coname,IFNULL(a.dlvno,''),IFNULL(a.dlvco,''),IFNULL(a.orderno,''),IFNULL(a.orderitemid,''),IFNULL(a.orderitemname,''),IFNULL(a.rcvuser,''),IFNULL(a.rcvusercontact,''),IFNULL(a.orderuser,''),IFNULL(f.CODE_NM,'')) LIKE '%' #dtSearch_all# '%'
d.pristock = #poSearch_pristock# and IFNULL(d.itemgubun,'1') in ('2')
d.byc010id = #poSearch_byc010id# and IFNULL(d.itemgubun,'1') in ('1','3')

select a.odm010id, a.orderno, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY) , '%Y-%m-%d') as orderdate, a.cum010id, a.cum030id, a.byc010id, a.orderuser, a.orderitemid as cumprodcode, a.orderusercontact, a.rcvuser, a.rcvusercontact, IFNULL(d.itemcode,'') orderitemid, a.orderitemopt, a.orderitemqty, a.orderitembyprice, a.postno, a.address, a.dlvmemo, a.dlvbyprice, a.dlvno, a.dlvco, a.dlvstatus, a.processdate, a.accountcum, a.accountbuy, a.status, a.cstype, a.uploadfilename, a.uploadviewkey, a.claimstatus, a.claimreason, a.retstatus, a.retqty, a.retprice, IFNULL(d.itemname, a.orderitemname) as orderitemname, a.regdate, IFNULL(a.orderitemprice,'') as orderitemprice, IFNULL(d.itemdlvprice, '') as dlvprice, a.rcvusercontacthp, a.rcvuseremail, b.coname, c.code_nm, IFNULL(d.itemname,'') as itemname, IFNULL(d.itemprice,'0') as itemprice, IFNULL(d.itembuyprice,'0') as itembuyprice, IFNULL(d.itemdlvprice,'0') as itemdlvprice, IFNULL(d.itembuydlvprice,'0') as itembuydlvprice, IFNULL(e.bycname,'') as bycname, f.CODE_NM as ststusNm, g.shopmallname, h.code_nm as cotype2nm, i.code_nm as cotype3nm, IFNULL(j.code_nm,'') as claimstatusnm, IFNULL(k.code_nm,'') as claimreasonnm, IFNULL(l.code_nm,'') as retstatusnm, b.account2, IFNULL(d.orderitemid,'NOITEM') as chkprod, case when IFNULL(chkcnt, 0) = 0 then 'NEW' else 'OVER' end chkoverlap from ismodm010 a left outer join ismcum040 bb on a.cum030id = bb.cum030id and a.orderitemid = bb.cumprodcode and a.orderitemopt = bb.cumprodoptnm1 left outer join ismprd010 d on bb.orderitemid = d.itemcode left outer join ismbyc010 e on d.byc010id = e.byc010id left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE f on a.status = f.CODE and f.CODE_ID = 'ISM050'
left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE j on a.claimstatus = j.CODE and j.CODE_ID = 'ISM060' left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE k on a.claimreason = k.CODE and k.CODE_ID = 'ISM070' left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE l on a.retstatus = l.CODE and l.CODE_ID = 'ISM080' left outer join (SELECT orderno, orderdate, cum010id, cum030id, byc010id, orderuser, orderusercontact, rcvuser, rcvusercontact, orderitemid, orderitemopt, orderitemqty, orderitembyprice, orderitemprice, postno, address, orderitemname , COUNT(1) chkcnt, sum(case when status = '' then 0 else 1 end ) chksum FROM ismodm010 GROUP BY orderno, orderdate, cum010id, cum030id, byc010id, orderuser, orderusercontact, rcvuser, rcvusercontact, orderitemid, orderitemopt, orderitemqty, orderitembyprice, orderitemprice, postno, address, orderitemname HAVING COUNT(1) > 1 ) x on a.orderno = x.orderno and a.orderdate = x.orderdate and a.cum010id = x.cum010id and a.cum030id = x.cum030id and a.byc010id = x.byc010id and a.orderuser = x.orderuser and a.orderusercontact = x.orderusercontact and a.rcvuser = x.rcvuser and a.rcvusercontact = x.rcvusercontact and a.orderitemid = x.orderitemid and a.orderitemopt = x.orderitemopt and a.orderitemqty = x.orderitemqty and a.orderitembyprice = x.orderitembyprice and a.orderitemprice = x.orderitemprice and a.postno = x.postno and a.address = x.address and a.orderitemname = x.orderitemname, ismcum010 b left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE h on b.cotype2 = h.CODE and h.CODE_ID in ('ISM031','ISM032') left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE i on b.cotype3 = i.CODE and i.CODE_ID in ('ISM041','ISM042','ISM043','ISM044'), LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE c, ismcum030 g where a.cum010id = b.cum010id and a.cum030id = g.cum030id and b.cotype1 = c.CODE and c.CODE_ID = 'ISM020'
a.uploadviewkey LIKE '%' #search_key1# '%'
a.odm010id = #odm010id#
a.status != ''
a.status = ''
a.uploadviewkey = #search_uploadviewkey# and a.cum010id = #search_cum010id# and a.cum030id = #search_cum030id#
a.uploadfilename = #search_uploadfilename#
d.orderitemid is not null and IFNULL(x.chkcnt, 0) = 0
d.orderitemid is null
x.chkcnt is not null
a.status = #search_status#
a.cstype = #search_cstype#
DATE_FORMAT(IF(a.orderdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)),'%Y-%m-%d') >= #dtSearch_frOrderDt#
DATE_FORMAT(IF(a.orderdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)),'%Y-%m-%d') <= #dtSearch_toOrderDt#
b.cotype1 = #dtSearch_cumType1#
e.bycname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_bycNm# '%'
b.coname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_cumNm# '%'
a.dlvno LIKE '%' #dtSearch_dlvNo# '%'
a.dlvco LIKE '%' #dtSearch_dlvCo# '%'
a.orderno LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderno# '%'
a.orderitemid LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemid# '%'
a.orderitemname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemName# '%'
a.rcvuser LIKE '%' #dtSearch_rcvUser# '%'
a.rcvusercontact LIKE '%' #dtSearch_rcvuserContact# '%'
a.orderuser LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderUser# '%'
concat(IFNULL(c.code_nm,''),IFNULL(e.bycname,''),b.coname,IFNULL(a.dlvno,''),IFNULL(a.dlvco,''),IFNULL(a.orderno,''),IFNULL(a.orderitemid,''),IFNULL(a.orderitemname,''),IFNULL(a.rcvuser,''),IFNULL(a.rcvusercontact,''),IFNULL(a.orderuser,''),IFNULL(f.CODE_NM,'')) LIKE '%' #dtSearch_all# '%'
d.pristock = #poSearch_pristock# and IFNULL(d.itemgubun,'1') in ('2')
d.byc010id = #poSearch_byc010id# and IFNULL(d.itemgubun,'1') in ('1','3')
order by a.odm010id desc limit #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
sqlMap.update:
update ismodm010 set processdate = now()
status = #selectoptionval#
accountcum = #selectaccountcumval#
accountbuy = #selectaccountbuyval#
where odm010id in
#chgodm010ids[]#

update ismodm010 set processdate = now()
status = #selectoptionval#
accountcum = #selectaccountcumval#
accountbuy = #selectaccountbuyval#
where uploadviewkey in
#uploadviewkeys[]#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from ismodm010 where odm010id in
#chgodm010ids[]#
sqlMap.update:
update ismodm010 set odm010id = odm010id
dlvprice = #dlvprice#
dlvno = #dlvno#
dlvmemo = #dlvmemo#
orderitemname = #orderitemname#
postno = #postno#
address = #address#
orderitemopt = #orderitemopt#
dlvco = #dlvco#
rcvuser = #rcvuser#
rcvusercontact = #rcvusercontact#
orderitemprice = #orderitemprice#
orderuser = #orderuser#
orderusercontact = #orderusercontact#
accountcum = #accountcum#
accountbuy = #accountbuy#
cstype = #cstype#
claimstatus = #claimstatus#
claimreason = #claimreason#
retstatus = #retstatus#
retqty = #retqty#
retprice = #retprice#
status = #status#, processdate = now()
rcvusercontacthp = #rcvusercontacthp#
rcvuseremail = #rcvuseremail#
where odm010id = #odm010id#
sqlMap.select: select o1.cum010id as cum010id, c1.coname as cum010name, o1.cum030id as cum030id, c3.shopmallname as cum030name, b.byc010id as byc010id, b.bycname as byc010name, sum(o1.orderitemprice) as itemprice, sum(p.itembuyprice) as itembuyprice from ismodm010 o1 left outer join ismcum010 c1 on c1.cum010id = o1.cum010id left outer join ismcum030 c3 on c3.cum030id = o1.cum030id left outer join ismprd010 p on p.itemcode = o1.orderitemcode left outer join ismbyc010 b on b.byc010id = p.byc010id where o1.closedt LIKE '%' #yyyymm# '%' and p.itemcode is not null and b.byc010id is not null and c1.cum010id is not null and c3.cum030id is not null group by o1.cum030id, b.byc010id order by cum030id asc

select b.byc010id as byc010id, b.bycname as byc010name, sum(o1.orderitemprice) as itemprice, sum(p.itembuyprice) as itembuyprice from ismodm010 o1 left outer join ismprd010 p on p.itemcode = o1.orderitemcode left outer join ismbyc010 b on b.byc010id = p.byc010id where o1.closedt LIKE '%' #yyyymm# '%' and p.itemcode is not null and b.byc010id is not null group by b.byc010id order by byc010id asc

select sum(o1.orderitemprice) as itemprice, sum(p.itembuyprice) as itembuyprice from ismodm010 o1 left outer join ismprd010 p on p.itemcode = o1.orderitemcode left outer join ismbyc010 b on b.byc010id = p.byc010id where o1.closedt is NULL and p.itemcode is not null and b.byc010id is not null and o1.orderdate LIKE '%' #yyyymm# '%'

select o1.cum010id as cum010id, c1.coname as cum010name, o1.cum030id as cum030id, c3.shopmallname as cum030name, b.byc010id as byc010id, b.bycname as byc010name, sum(o1.orderitemprice) as itemprice, sum(p.itembuyprice) as itembuyprice from ismodm010 o1 left outer join ismcum010 c1 on c1.cum010id = o1.cum010id left outer join ismcum030 c3 on c3.cum030id = o1.cum030id left outer join ismprd010 p on p.itemcode = o1.orderitemcode left outer join ismbyc010 b on b.byc010id = p.byc010id where o1.bycclosedt LIKE '%' #yyyymm# '%' and p.itemcode is not null and b.byc010id is not null and c1.cum010id is not null and c3.cum030id is not null group by o1.cum030id, b.byc010id order by cum030id asc

select b.byc010id as byc010id, b.bycname as byc010name, sum(o1.orderitemprice) as itemprice, sum(p.itembuyprice) as itembuyprice from ismodm010 o1 left outer join ismprd010 p on p.itemcode = o1.orderitemcode left outer join ismbyc010 b on b.byc010id = p.byc010id where o1.bycclosedt LIKE '%' #yyyymm# '%' and p.itemcode is not null and b.byc010id is not null group by b.byc010id order by byc010id asc

select sum(o1.orderitemprice) as itemprice, sum(p.itembuyprice) as itembuyprice from ismodm010 o1 left outer join ismprd010 p on p.itemcode = o1.orderitemcode left outer join ismbyc010 b on b.byc010id = p.byc010id where o1.bycclosedt is null and p.itemcode is not null and b.byc010id is not null and o1.orderdate LIKE '%' #yyyymm# '%'

select b.byc010id as byc010id, b.bycname as byc010name, sum(o1.orderitemprice) as itemprice from ismodm010 o1 left outer join ismprd010 p on p.itemcode = o1.orderitemcode left outer join ismbyc010 b on b.byc010id = p.byc010id where p.itemcode is not null and b.byc010id is not null group by b.byc010id order by itemprice desc limit 10

/*ord020DAO.selectStattList*/ SELECT t1.uploadviewkey , t1.updatedt , t1.uploadfilename , t1.cum010id , t1.coname , t1.cum030id , t1.shopmallname , t1.totcnt , t1.succcnt , t1.prodfailcnt , t1.overlapcnt from ( select a.uploadviewkey , a.uploadfilename , CONCAT_WS('.', substring(a.uploadviewkey, 1, 4) , substring(a.uploadviewkey, 5, 2), substring(a.uploadviewkey, 7, 2) ) updatedt , a.cum010id , b.coname , a.cum030id , g.shopmallname , count(*) totcnt , sum(case when d.itemcode is not null and IFNULL(chkcnt, 0) = 0 then 1 else 0 end) succcnt , sum(case when d.itemcode is null then 1 else 0 end) prodfailcnt , sum(case when IFNULL(chkcnt, 0) = 0 then 0 else 1 end) overlapcnt from ismodm010 a left outer join ismcum040 bb on a.cum030id = bb.cum030id and a.orderitemid = bb.cumprodcode and a.orderitemopt = bb.cumprodoptnm1 left outer join ismprd010 d on bb.orderitemid = d.itemcode left outer join ismbyc010 e on d.byc010id = e.byc010id left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE f on a.status = f.CODE and f.CODE_ID = 'ISM050'
left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE j on a.claimstatus = j.CODE and j.CODE_ID = 'ISM060' left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE k on a.claimreason = k.CODE and k.CODE_ID = 'ISM070' left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE l on a.retstatus = l.CODE and l.CODE_ID = 'ISM080' left outer join (SELECT orderno, orderdate, cum010id, cum030id, byc010id, orderuser, orderusercontact, rcvuser, rcvusercontact, orderitemid, orderitemopt, orderitemqty, orderitembyprice, orderitemprice, postno, address, orderitemname , COUNT(1) chkcnt, sum(case when status = '' then 0 else 1 end ) chksum FROM ismodm010 GROUP BY orderno, orderdate, cum010id, cum030id, byc010id, orderuser, orderusercontact, rcvuser, rcvusercontact, orderitemid, orderitemopt, orderitemqty, orderitembyprice, orderitemprice, postno, address, orderitemname HAVING COUNT(1) > 1 ) x on a.orderno = x.orderno and a.orderdate = x.orderdate and a.cum010id = x.cum010id and a.cum030id = x.cum030id and a.byc010id = x.byc010id and a.orderuser = x.orderuser and a.orderusercontact = x.orderusercontact and a.rcvuser = x.rcvuser and a.rcvusercontact = x.rcvusercontact and a.orderitemid = x.orderitemid and a.orderitemopt = x.orderitemopt and a.orderitemqty = x.orderitemqty and a.orderitembyprice = x.orderitembyprice and a.orderitemprice = x.orderitemprice and a.postno = x.postno and a.address = x.address and a.orderitemname = x.orderitemname, ismcum010 b left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE h on b.cotype2 = h.CODE and h.CODE_ID in ('ISM031','ISM032') left outer join LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE i on b.cotype3 = i.CODE and i.CODE_ID in ('ISM041','ISM042','ISM043','ISM044'), LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE c, ismcum030 g where a.cum010id = b.cum010id and a.cum030id = g.cum030id and b.cotype1 = c.CODE and c.CODE_ID = 'ISM020'
a.odm010id = #odm010id#
a.status != ''
a.status = ''
a.status = #search_status#
a.cstype = #search_cstype#
DATE_FORMAT(IF(a.orderdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)),'%Y-%m-%d') >= #dtSearch_frOrderDt#
DATE_FORMAT(IF(a.orderdate = '', curdate(), DATE_ADD(a.orderdate, INTERVAL 0 DAY)),'%Y-%m-%d') <= #dtSearch_toOrderDt#
b.cotype1 = #dtSearch_cumType1#
e.bycname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_bycNm# '%'
b.coname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_cumNm# '%'
a.dlvno LIKE '%' #dtSearch_dlvNo# '%'
a.dlvco LIKE '%' #dtSearch_dlvCo# '%'
a.orderno LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderno# '%'
a.orderitemid LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemid# '%'
a.orderitemname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemName# '%'
a.rcvuser LIKE '%' #dtSearch_rcvUser# '%'
a.rcvusercontact LIKE '%' #dtSearch_rcvuserContact# '%'
a.orderuser LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderUser# '%'
concat(IFNULL(c.code_nm,''),IFNULL(e.bycname,''),b.coname,IFNULL(a.dlvno,''),IFNULL(a.dlvco,''),IFNULL(a.orderno,''),IFNULL(a.orderitemid,''),IFNULL(a.orderitemname,''),IFNULL(a.rcvuser,''),IFNULL(a.rcvusercontact,''),IFNULL(a.orderuser,''),IFNULL(f.CODE_NM,'')) LIKE '%' #dtSearch_all# '%'
d.pristock = #poSearch_pristock# and IFNULL(d.itemgubun,'1') in ('2')
d.byc010id = #poSearch_byc010id# and IFNULL(d.itemgubun,'1') in ('1','3')
group by a.uploadviewkey , a.uploadfilename , a.cum010id , b.coname , a.cum030id , g.shopmallname ) t1 order by t1.updatedt desc, t1.cum010id

select /*ord020DAO.selectProdList*/ p.orderitemid, p.itemcat1, p.itemname, p.byc010id, p.itemcrosstype, p.itemopt, p.itemea, p.itemprice, p.itembuyprice, p.taxtype, p.itemdlvprice, p.itembuydlvprice, p.itemgubun, p.createdate, p.byccode, p.itemcode, p.pristock, p.itemsize, p.cartonqty, p.palletqty, b.bycname, w.whsname from ismprd010 p left outer join ismbyc010 b on p.byc010id = b.byc010id left outer join ismwhs010 w on p.pristock = w.whs010id where p.orderitemid > 0 and b.byc010id is not null
b.bycname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_bycNm# '%'
p.itemcode LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemid# '%'
p.itemname LIKE '%' #dtSearch_orderItemName# '%'
order by p.orderitemid desc
sqlMap.insert: /*ord020DAO.ord020InsertProd*/ insert into ismcum040 (cum030id, orderitemid, cumprodcode, cumprodoptnm1) values (#cum030id#, #itemcode#, #orderitemid#, #cumprodoptnm1#)
sqlMap.select: select byc010id code, bycname value from ismbyc010 where useyn = 'Y'
select cum010id code, coname value from ismcum010 where useyn = 'Y'
